replies.msg:
http://multimedia.3m.com/mws/media/447121O/filter-change-out-brochure.pdf

Filters should be disposed of and replaced if:

they become soiled, damaged, or difficult to comfortably breathe through
you start to smell or taste the contaminant
the stamped manufacturers expiry date has elapsed
once opened, the filter has exceeded its maximum use time of 6 months (this applies even if the filter is not used as the filter will continue to absorb contaminants from the atmosphere)
Filters should also be replaced in accordance with any established change schedule or government regulations. Provided the filters are stored correctly and remain unopened, they have a shelf life of up to 5 years.

replies.msg:
40hr係3m官方說明書寫，自己google la

但前提是工業重用途，3m另有官方說明醫用濾病毒對濾棉損耗好低，所以最少能用足一個疫季（兩三個月）或直至濾棉濾滿堵塞吸氣困難時替換，但香港人一般鍚身，巴打們一般都建議無咩特別就用夠一個月左右換過塊。
